title: Bügelperlen ... aber anders
abstract: Für Bügelperlen braucht es nicht unbedingt ein Bügeleisen.
description:
Normally, you'd use a pegboard and an iron for fuse beads.

But you can also do it without... all you need is a needle and thread, and you can make bracelets or coasters.

Want to know how? Come by, let me show you, and get started yourself.

persons.name: elzbeth
persons.biography: You can find me in Kidspace.
